Oakland.Mosswood Park:
Mosswood Park is an 4-acre (16,000 m2) public park in Oakland, California, located on W MacArthur Boulevard between Webster Street and Broadway. Managed by the City of Oakland's Department of Parks and Recreation, it contains a community recreation center as well as extensive grassy lawns, picnic areas, children's play equipment, dog runs, tennis and basketball courts, and baseball fields.
Programs at the park include after-school tutoring for grades K-7, along with numerous other after-school classes.
